sentences.sContent: I would rather sit on a pumpkin, alone and not crowded, sitting on the seat of the velvet.
sentences.sContent_eng: I would rather sit on a pumpkin, alone and not crowded, sitting on the seat of the velvet.
sentences.sCn: 我宁愿独自坐在一只南瓜上，而不愿拥挤地坐在天鹅绒的座垫上。 缗。

synos.tran: 天鹅绒，[纺]丝绒；天鹅绒似的东西

phrases.pCn: 黑天鹅绒；烈性黑啤酒和香槟的混合饮料；[俚]黑种女人

words.tran: 天鹅绒般柔软的；醇和的，可口的

trans.tranCn: 天鹅绒 characterized by a short soft dense warp pile)； 天鹅绒似的东西
trans.tranOther: a type of expensive cloth with a soft surface on one side
